verses.text: \w Paul|strong="G3972"\w*, an \w apostle|strong="G0652"\w* of \w Jesus|strong="G2424"\w* \w Christ|strong="G5547"\w* \w by|strong="G1223"\w* the \w will|strong="G2307"\w* of \w God|strong="G2316"\w*, \w and|strong="G2532"\w* \w Timothy|strong="G5095"\w* \add our\add* \w brother|strong="G0080"\w*, unto the \w church|strong="G1577"\w* of \w God|strong="G2316"\w* which \w is|strong="G5607"\w* \w at|strong="G1722"\w* \w Corinth|strong="G2882"\w*, \w with|strong="G4862"\w* \w all|strong="G3956"\w* the \w saints|strong="G0040"\w* which \w are|strong="G5607"\w* \w in|strong="G1722"\w* \w all|strong="G3650"\w* \w Achaia|strong="G0882"\w*:

\w Grace|strong="G5485"\w* \add be\add* to \w you|strong="G5213"\w* \w and|strong="G2532"\w* \w peace|strong="G1515"\w* \w from|strong="G0575"\w* \w God|strong="G2316"\w* \w our|strong="G2257"\w* \w Father|strong="G3962"\w*, \w and|strong="G2532"\w* \add from\add* the \w Lord|strong="G2962"\w* \w Jesus|strong="G2424"\w* \w Christ|strong="G5547"\w*.

\w Blessed|strong="G2128"\w* \add be\add* \w God|strong="G2316"\w*, \w even|strong="G2532"\w* the \w Father|strong="G3962"\w* of \w our|strong="G2257"\w* \w Lord|strong="G2962"\w* \w Jesus|strong="G2424"\w* \w Christ|strong="G5547"\w*, the \w Father|strong="G3962"\w* of \w mercies|strong="G3628"\w*, \w and|strong="G2532"\w* the \w God|strong="G2316"\w* of \w all|strong="G3956"\w* \w comfort|strong="G3874"\w*;

\w Who|strong="G3588"\w* \w comforteth|strong="G3870"\w* \w us|strong="G2248"\w* \w in|strong="G1909"\w* \w all|strong="G3956"\w* \w our|strong="G2257"\w* \w tribulation|strong="G2347"\w*, that \w we|strong="G2248"\w* may be \w able|strong="G1410"\w* \w to|strong="G1519"\w* \w comfort|strong="G3870"\w* \w them|strong="G3588"\w* which \w are|strong="G3739"\w* \w in|strong="G1722"\w* \w any|strong="G3956"\w* \w trouble|strong="G2347"\w*, \w by|strong="G1223"\w* the comfort \w wherewith|strong="G3874"\w* we \w ourselves|strong="G0846"\w* are \w comforted|strong="G3870"\w* \w of|strong="G5259"\w* \w God|strong="G2316"\w*.

\w For|strong="G3754"\w* \w as|strong="G2531"\w* the \w sufferings|strong="G3804"\w* of \w Christ|strong="G5547"\w* \w abound|strong="G4052"\w* \w in|strong="G1519"\w* \w us|strong="G2248"\w*, \w so|strong="G3779"\w* \w our|strong="G2257"\w* \w consolation|strong="G3874"\w* \w also|strong="G2532"\w* \w aboundeth|strong="G4052"\w* \w by|strong="G1223"\w* \w Christ|strong="G5547"\w*.

\w And|strong="G1161"\w* \w whether|strong="G1535"\w* we be \w afflicted|strong="G2346"\w*, \add it is\add* \w for|strong="G5228"\w* \w your|strong="G5216"\w* \w consolation|strong="G3874"\w* \w and|strong="G2532"\w* \w salvation|strong="G4991"\w*, \w which|strong="G3588"\w* is \w effectual|strong="G1754"\w* \w in|strong="G1722"\w* the \w enduring|strong="G5281"\w* of the \w same|strong="G0846"\w* \w sufferings|strong="G3804"\w* \w which|strong="G3739"\w* \w we|strong="G2249"\w* \w also|strong="G2532"\w* \w suffer|strong="G3958"\w*: or \w whether|strong="G1535"\w* we be \w comforted|strong="G3870"\w*, \add it is\add* \w for|strong="G5228"\w* \w your|strong="G5216"\w* \w consolation|strong="G3874"\w* \w and|strong="G2532"\w* \w salvation|strong="G4991"\w*.

And our hope of you \add is\add* stedfast, \w knowing|strong="G1492"\w*, \w that|strong="G3754"\w* \w as|strong="G5618"\w* ye \w are|strong="G2075"\w* \w partakers|strong="G2844"\w* of the \w sufferings|strong="G3804"\w*, \w so|strong="G3779"\w* \add shall ye be\add* \w also|strong="G2532"\w* of the \w consolation|strong="G3874"\w*.

\w For|strong="G1063"\w* we \w would|strong="G2309"\w* \w not|strong="G3756"\w*, \w brethren|strong="G0080"\w*, \w have|strong="G0050"\w* \w you|strong="G5209"\w* \w ignorant|strong="G0050"\w* \w of|strong="G5228"\w* \w our|strong="G2257"\w* \w trouble|strong="G2347"\w* which \w came|strong="G1096"\w* to \w us|strong="G2254"\w* \w in|strong="G1722"\w* \w Asia|strong="G0773"\w*, \w that|strong="G3754"\w* we were \w pressed|strong="G0916"\w* \w out|strong="G2596"\w* of \w measure|strong="G5236"\w*, \w above|strong="G5228"\w* \w strength|strong="G1411"\w*, insomuch \w that|strong="G5620"\w* \w we|strong="G2248"\w* \w despaired|strong="G1820"\w* \w even|strong="G2532"\w* of \w life|strong="G2198"\w*:

\w But|strong="G0235"\w* \w we|strong="G0846"\w* \w had|strong="G2192"\w* the \w sentence|strong="G0610"\w* of \w death|strong="G2288"\w* \w in|strong="G1722"\w* \w ourselves|strong="G1438"\w*, \w that|strong="G2443"\w* we \w should|strong="G5600"\w* \w not|strong="G3361"\w* \w trust|strong="G3982"\w* \w in|strong="G1909"\w* \w ourselves|strong="G1438"\w*, \w but|strong="G0235"\w* \w in|strong="G1909"\w* \w God|strong="G2316"\w* \w which|strong="G3588"\w* \w raiseth|strong="G1453"\w* the \w dead|strong="G3498"\w*:

\w Who|strong="G3739"\w* \w delivered|strong="G4506"\w* \w us|strong="G2248"\w* \w from|strong="G1537"\w* so \w great|strong="G5082"\w* a \w death|strong="G2288"\w*, \w and|strong="G2532"\w* doth \w deliver|strong="G4506"\w*: \w in|strong="G1519"\w* \w whom|strong="G3739"\w* we \w trust|strong="G1679"\w* \w that|strong="G3754"\w* he \w will|strong="G4506"\w* \w yet|strong="G2089"\w* \w deliver|strong="G4506"\w* \add us\add*;

\w Ye|strong="G5216"\w* \w also|strong="G2532"\w* helping \w together|strong="G4943"\w* by \w prayer|strong="G1162"\w* \w for|strong="G5228"\w* \w us|strong="G2257"\w*, \w that|strong="G2443"\w* for the \w gift|strong="G5486"\w* \add bestowed\add* \w upon|strong="G1519"\w* \w us|strong="G2248"\w* by the means \w of|strong="G1537"\w* \w many|strong="G4183"\w* \w persons|strong="G4383"\w* thanks may be \w given|strong="G2168"\w* \w by|strong="G1223"\w* \w many|strong="G4183"\w* \w on|strong="G5228"\w* our \w behalf|strong="G2257"\w*.

\w For|strong="G1063"\w* \w our|strong="G2257"\w* \w rejoicing|strong="G2746"\w* \w is|strong="G2076"\w* \w this|strong="G3778"\w*, the \w testimony|strong="G3142"\w* of \w our|strong="G2257"\w* \w conscience|strong="G4893"\w*, \w that|strong="G3754"\w* \w in|strong="G1722"\w* \w simplicity|strong="G0572"\w* \w and|strong="G2532"\w* \w godly|strong="G2316"\w* \w sincerity|strong="G1505"\w*, \w not|strong="G3756"\w* \w with|strong="G1722"\w* \w fleshly|strong="G4559"\w* \w wisdom|strong="G4678"\w*, \w but|strong="G0235"\w* \w by|strong="G1722"\w* the \w grace|strong="G5485"\w* of \w God|strong="G2316"\w*, we have had our \w conversation|strong="G0390"\w* \w in|strong="G1722"\w* the \w world|strong="G2889"\w*, \w and|strong="G1161"\w* more \w abundantly|strong="G4056"\w* \w to|strong="G4314"\w* \w you-ward|strong="G5209"\w*.

\w For|strong="G1063"\w* we \w write|strong="G1125"\w* \w none|strong="G3756"\w* other \w things|strong="G0243"\w* unto \w you|strong="G5213"\w*, \w than|strong="G0235"\w* \w what|strong="G3739"\w* ye \w read|strong="G0314"\w* \w or|strong="G2228"\w* \w acknowledge|strong="G1921"\w*; \w and|strong="G1161"\w* I \w trust|strong="G1679"\w* ye shall \w acknowledge|strong="G1921"\w* \w even|strong="G2532"\w* \w to|strong="G2193"\w* the \w end|strong="G5056"\w*;

\w As|strong="G2531"\w* \w also|strong="G2532"\w* ye have \w acknowledged|strong="G1921"\w* \w us|strong="G2248"\w* \w in|strong="G0575"\w* \w part|strong="G3313"\w*, \w that|strong="G3754"\w* we \w are|strong="G2070"\w* \w your|strong="G5216"\w* \w rejoicing|strong="G2745"\w*, even \w as|strong="G2509"\w* \w ye|strong="G5210"\w* \w also|strong="G2532"\w* \add are\add* \w ours|strong="G2257"\w* \w in|strong="G1722"\w* the \w day|strong="G2250"\w* of the \w Lord|strong="G2962"\w* \w Jesus|strong="G2424"\w*.

\w And|strong="G2532"\w* in \w this|strong="G3778"\w* \w confidence|strong="G4006"\w* I was \w minded|strong="G1014"\w* to \w come|strong="G2064"\w* \w unto|strong="G4314"\w* \w you|strong="G5209"\w* \w before|strong="G4386"\w*, \w that|strong="G2443"\w* ye might \w have|strong="G2192"\w* a \w second|strong="G1208"\w* \w benefit|strong="G5485"\w*;

\w And|strong="G2532"\w* to \w pass|strong="G1330"\w* \w by|strong="G1223"\w* \w you|strong="G5216"\w* \w into|strong="G1519"\w* \w Macedonia|strong="G3109"\w*, \w and|strong="G2532"\w* to \w come|strong="G2064"\w* \w again|strong="G3825"\w* out \w of|strong="G0575"\w* \w Macedonia|strong="G3109"\w* \w unto|strong="G4314"\w* \w you|strong="G5209"\w*, \w and|strong="G2532"\w* \w of|strong="G5259"\w* \w you|strong="G5216"\w* to be brought on my \w way|strong="G4311"\w* \w toward|strong="G1519"\w* \w Judaea|strong="G2449"\w*.

When I \w therefore|strong="G3767"\w* \w was|strong="G1011"\w* \w thus|strong="G5124"\w* \w minded|strong="G1011"\w*, \w did|strong="G3361"\w* I \w use|strong="G5530"\w* \w lightness|strong="G1644"\w*? \w or|strong="G2228"\w* the \w things|strong="G3739"\w* that I \w purpose|strong="G1011"\w*, do I \w purpose|strong="G1011"\w* according \w to|strong="G2596"\w* the \w flesh|strong="G4561"\w*, \w that|strong="G2443"\w* \w with|strong="G3844"\w* \w me|strong="G1698"\w* there should \w be|strong="G5600"\w* \w yea|strong="G3483"\w* \w yea|strong="G3483"\w*, \w and|strong="G2532"\w* \w nay|strong="G3756"\w* \w nay|strong="G3756"\w*?

\w But|strong="G1161"\w* \add as\add* \w God|strong="G2316"\w* \add is\add* \w true|strong="G4103"\w*, \w our|strong="G2257"\w* \w word|strong="G3056"\w* \w toward|strong="G4314"\w* \w you|strong="G5209"\w* \w was|strong="G1096"\w* \w not|strong="G3756"\w* \w yea|strong="G3483"\w* \w and|strong="G2532"\w* \w nay|strong="G3756"\w*.

\w For|strong="G1063"\w* the \w Son|strong="G5207"\w* of \w God|strong="G2316"\w*, \w Jesus|strong="G2424"\w* \w Christ|strong="G5547"\w*, \w who|strong="G3588"\w* was \w preached|strong="G2784"\w* \w among|strong="G1722"\w* \w you|strong="G5213"\w* \w by|strong="G1223"\w* \w us|strong="G2257"\w*, \add even\add* \w by|strong="G1223"\w* \w me|strong="G1700"\w* \w and|strong="G2532"\w* \w Silvanus|strong="G4610"\w* \w and|strong="G2532"\w* \w Timotheus|strong="G5095"\w*, \w was|strong="G1096"\w* \w not|strong="G3756"\w* \w yea|strong="G3483"\w* \w and|strong="G2532"\w* \w nay|strong="G3756"\w*, \w but|strong="G0235"\w* \w in|strong="G1722"\w* \w him|strong="G0846"\w* \w was|strong="G1096"\w* \w yea|strong="G3483"\w*.

\w For|strong="G1063"\w* \w all|strong="G3745"\w* the \w promises|strong="G1860"\w* of \w God|strong="G2316"\w* \w in|strong="G1722"\w* \w him|strong="G0846"\w* \add are\add* \w yea|strong="G3483"\w*, \w and|strong="G2532"\w* \w in|strong="G1722"\w* \w him|strong="G0846"\w* \w Amen|strong="G0281"\w*, \w unto|strong="G4314"\w* the \w glory|strong="G1391"\w* of \w God|strong="G2316"\w* \w by|strong="G1223"\w* \w us|strong="G2257"\w*.

\w Now|strong="G1161"\w* he \w which|strong="G3588"\w* \w stablisheth|strong="G0950"\w* \w us|strong="G2248"\w* \w with|strong="G4862"\w* \w you|strong="G5213"\w* \w in|strong="G1519"\w* \w Christ|strong="G5547"\w*, \w and|strong="G2532"\w* hath \w anointed|strong="G5548"\w* \w us|strong="G2248"\w*, \add is\add* \w God|strong="G2316"\w*;

\w Who|strong="G3588"\w* \w hath|strong="G4972"\w* \w also|strong="G2532"\w* \w sealed|strong="G4972"\w* \w us|strong="G2248"\w*, \w and|strong="G2532"\w* \w given|strong="G1325"\w* the \w earnest|strong="G0728"\w* of the \w Spirit|strong="G4151"\w* \w in|strong="G1722"\w* \w our|strong="G2257"\w* \w hearts|strong="G2588"\w*.

\w Moreover|strong="G1161"\w* \w I|strong="G1473"\w* \w call|strong="G1941"\w* \w God|strong="G2316"\w* for a \w record|strong="G3144"\w* \w upon|strong="G1909"\w* \w my|strong="G1699"\w* \w soul|strong="G5590"\w*, \w that|strong="G3754"\w* to \w spare|strong="G5339"\w* \w you|strong="G5216"\w* I \w came|strong="G2064"\w* not as \w yet|strong="G3765"\w* \w unto|strong="G1519"\w* \w Corinth|strong="G2882"\w*.

\w Not|strong="G3756"\w* for \w that|strong="G3754"\w* we have \w dominion|strong="G2961"\w* over \w your|strong="G5216"\w* \w faith|strong="G4102"\w*, \w but|strong="G0235"\w* \w are|strong="G2070"\w* \w helpers|strong="G4904"\w* of \w your|strong="G5216"\w* \w joy|strong="G5479"\w*: \w for|strong="G1063"\w* by \w faith|strong="G4102"\w* ye \w stand|strong="G2476"\w*.
